references.title: The InfoFinder Agent: Learning User Interests through Heuristic Phrase Extraction
references.description: This article presents the approach taken by the InfoFinder project. InfoFinder learnsprofiles of user interests from sample documents that users submit while browsing, without surveying them as to their interest in a set of sample documents.
